content: check out this cozy crochet sweater that s the ideal go-with-anything garment of warmth created in bernat mist-ical the pattern is worked in the round in double_crochet granny clusters gathered sleeves and a generous body are perfect for layering and will keep you toasty wherever you are practice granny stitch hexagon double_crochet chains seaming and more a relaxed and comfy fit makes this a new favorite in any closet materials bernat® blanket mist-ical™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m sizes xs/s m/l 1/2/3xl 4/5xl pink quartz 13016 5 6 8 10 balls sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m/l 36-42 91 5-106 5 cm 1/2/3xl 44-54 112-137 cm 4/5xl 56-60 142-152 5 cm finished chest xs/s 40 101 5 cm m/l 48 122 cm 1/2/3xl 56 142 cm 4/5xl 64 162 5 cm
